title: Greece Private Debt to GDP
description: Private Debt to GDP in Greece decreased to 134.60 percent in 2021 from 138.60 percent in 2020. Private Debt to GDP in Greece averaged 107.99 percent from 1995 until 2021, reaching an all time high of 151 percent in 2012 and a record low of 49.40 percent in 1995. Private sector debt to GDP measures the indebtedness of both sectors, non-financial corporations and households and non-profit institutions serving households, as a percentage of GDP.
author: OECD
